com.ibm.team.repository.common

Class Messages

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.team.repository.common.Messages

  • public class Messages
extends java.lang.Object
    Convenience class for getting localized messages out of nls/Messages.properties files.

    Instances can be retrieved using getMessages(Class).

    Location of resource bundle
    This API will look for the "messages.properties" file in the following locations:
    1. In the same package as the specified class. (e.g. "com.ibm.mypackage/messages.properties").
    2. In the "nls" subpackage of the class package. (e.g. "com.ibm.mypackage.nls/messages.properties).
    3. In the "nls" subpackage of the parent of the class package. (e.g. "com.ibm.nls/messages.properties).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Messages getMessages(java.lang.Class<?> forClass)
      Return the Messages class for the specified class.
      java.lang.String getString(java.lang.String key)
      Returns the localized message with the specified key.
      java.lang.String getString(java.lang.String key, java.lang.Object... args)
      Returns the localized message with the specified key with MessageFormat variables filled in with the specified arguments.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getMessages

        public static Messages getMessages(java.lang.Class<?> forClass)
        Return the Messages class for the specified class.

        See MessageBundle for the valid locations of the messages.properties file.

        Parameters:
        forClass - The class to look up messages on.
        Returns:
        The new messages object. Never null.

      • getString

        public java.lang.String getString(java.lang.String key)
        Returns the localized message with the specified key.

        If resource bundle is missing, returns "{!!key}".
        If key is missing from resource bundle, return "{!key}".

        Parameters:
        key - The message key in the properties file.
        Returns:
        The localized message, never null.

      • getString

        public java.lang.String getString(java.lang.String key,
                                  java.lang.Object... args)
        Returns the localized message with the specified key with MessageFormat variables filled in with the specified arguments.

        If resource bundle is missing, returns "{!!key}".
        If key is missing from resource bundle, return "{!key}".

        Parameters:
        key - The message key in the properties file.
        Returns:
        The localized message, never null.
